testcase.name: Verify_Available_Products_On_Inventory_Page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Verify available products on inventory page given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.419s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.0674s e then User should see 6 products listed ... passed in 0.03294s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Sort_Products_By_Different_Options_--_@1.1_
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Sort products by different options -- @1.1 given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 6.383s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.06782s e when the user sorts products by 'az' ... passed in 2.59s then the products should be sorted by 'name ascending' order ... passed in 0.01795s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Sort_Products_By_Different_Options_--_@1.2_
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Sort products by different options -- @1.2 given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.403s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.1466s e when the user sorts products by 'za' ... passed in 2.516s then the products should be sorted by 'name descending' order ... passed in 0.009974s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Logout_From_Inventory_Page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Logout from inventory page given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.347s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.06682s e when user logs out from the application ... passed in 2.473s then user should be redirected to the login page ... passed in 0.007979s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
